#  World Class. _Worldwide_.

Discover what makes us unique

Loading silent video

Pause silent video

Founded on the ideals of _inclusivity, diversity_ and _collaboration_ , the
University of London is a pioneering institution committed to increasing
access to _education_ , championing _research excellence_ and delivering
_social good_.

Course search

Search

Why study with us

All undergraduate courses

All postgraduate courses

##  News, events and updates

##  Federation members announce merger

Two federation members, St George’s, University of London, and City,
University of London, have announced their agreement to merge.

Read more

##  School of Advanced Study postgraduate award ceremony

School of Advanced Study graduates and Honorary Graduate Chiwetel Ejiofor
received awards at Senate House on 8 February.

Read more

##  The University of London Celebrates Shakespeare Month

This month, the University of London will focus on all things Shakespeare.

Read more

##  Royal Central School of Speech and Drama receives £5.6 million from
Research England

To establish Centre for Performance, Technology and Equity

Read more

##  Charles Holden’s Master Plan: Building the Bloomsbury Campus

‘Charles Holden’s Master Plan’ celebrates the architect’s vision of what a
modern university could be through displays of detailed architectural models,
archival documents, photo albums, and other mixed media.

Register now

Next Next

##  What our students say

Play video (opens in modal)

> “The online platform enabled me to work while I was studying, and I didn't
> have to worry about commuting.”

Simon Horton

BSc Computer Science

Play video (opens in modal)

> “I'd heard a lot about the University of London LLB. You can get a world-
> class education in your home country.”

Maarij Shabbir

Bachelor of Laws (LLB)

Play video (opens in modal)

> “If you’re able to learn independently, I would absolutely recommend a
> University of London degree – the professors are incredible.”

Stephanie Browning

MA Human Rights

Play video (opens in modal)

> “I would absolutely recommend it. I learned a lot. They take this education
> really seriously.”

Cristiane Jesen

MSc Clinical Trials

> “Every subject and topic I studied was extremely interesting, and that's
> what kept me going.”

Venkatesh Prasad

PGCert International Sports Management

##  Our federation

We are a federation consisting of _17 independent members_. We work _together_
to deliver the _best education_ in London and across the world.

Learn more about our federation
